product_name: REI Nylon Duffel Bag - X Large - Special Buy
long_description: Big and burly, the REI X Large REI Nylon Duffel Bag doles out more than 5,500 cu. in. of gear-swallowing space and tucks away in a convenient, compact storage pouch when not in use. 420-denier ripstop nylon is lightweight and tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access into main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Tote duffel bag comfortably with the included adjustable shoulder strap. The REI X Large REI Nylon Duffel Bag has a convenient storage sack that doubles as a toiletry bag. Special buy.
short_description: Big and burly, the REI X Large REI Nylon Duffel Bag doles out more than 5,500 cu. in. of gear-swallowing space and tucks away in a convenient, compact storage pouch when not in use.
